"Then <WG5119> he <WG3004> said to <WG1401> his <WG846> servants, <WG3303> <WG1062> 'The wedding is <WG2076> ready, <WG2092> but <WG1161> those who were invited <WG2564> weren't <WG3756> worthy. <WG514>

"Teacher, <WG1320> which <WG4169> is the <WG1785> greatest <WG3173> commandment <WG1785> in <WG1722> the law? <WG3551>"

No <WG2532> one <WG3762> was able <WG1410> to answer <WG611> him <WG846> a word, <WG3056> neither <WG3761> did any <WG5100> man dare <WG5111> ask <WG1905> him <WG846> any more <WG3765> questions from <WG575> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> forth. <WG575>
